## usePromiseOutputFormatter variable

Applies an output formatter to the resolved ouput promise of a function

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
usePromiseOutputFormatter: <A, B, C>(fn: (a: A) => Promise<B>, outputFormatter: (b: B) => C) => (a: A) => Promise<C>
```
